Senior Developer Advocate
description: Tailscale is looking for a Senior Developer Advocate to join the team. You will create technical content, build demos, speak at conferences, and engage with the developer community to drive adoption of Tailscale's networking solutions.

title: Developer Relations Engineer
description: OpenRouter is hiring a Developer Relations Engineer to help developers integrate with their unified AI model API. Build sample apps, write documentation, create tutorials, and support the developer community.

title: Developer Advocate
description: NetApp seeks a Developer Advocate to drive adoption of cloud data services. Create technical content, deliver workshops, engage with open source communities, and represent NetApp at industry events.

title: Developer Relations Lead
description: Zencoder is looking for a Developer Relations Lead to build and scale the DevRel program. Define strategy, create technical content, foster community engagement, and drive developer adoption of AI coding tools.

title: Developer Advocate
description: AuthZed is hiring a Developer Advocate to grow the SpiceDB community. Write technical blog posts, create video content, speak at conferences, and help developers implement authorization solutions.

description: GenLayer Labs is seeking a Developer Relations Manager to build and lead developer community initiatives for their Web3 infrastructure platform. Drive hackathons, create educational content, and grow the ecosystem.

description: LayerZero Labs is hiring a Developer Advocate to support cross-chain protocol adoption. Create tutorials, build demo applications, participate in hackathons, and engage with the omnichain developer community.

title: Head of Developer Relations

description: Polymarket is hiring a Developer Relations Engineer to support developers building on their prediction market platform. Create technical documentation, sample code, and developer tools.

description: Celestia is hiring a Developer Advocate to promote modular blockchain architecture. Create content explaining data availability layers, build example rollups, and engage with the modular ecosystem.

description: MongoDB is looking for a Senior Developer Advocate to create compelling content, deliver technical talks, and build sample applications that showcase MongoDB Atlas capabilities for modern app development.

description: Okta is looking for a Head of Developer Relations to lead the identity platform's DevRel strategy. Manage a team of advocates, define KPIs, build community programs, and drive developer-first growth.

description: Databricks seeks a Developer Advocate to promote their lakehouse platform. Create content on data engineering and AI workflows, build demo notebooks, and speak at data community events.

description: Coveo is hiring a Developer Relations Engineer to support search and AI relevance developers. Create integration guides, build sample projects, and contribute to developer documentation.

description: Elastic is looking for a Senior Developer Advocate focused on observability and security use cases. Build demos with Elasticsearch, create OpenTelemetry tutorials, and engage at DevOps conferences.
